title: Marsh - Billings - Rockefeller National Historical Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions         Jersey heifers at the Billings Farm & Museum NPS Photo  Billings Farm & Museum  Learn about Vermont dairying - past and present - and the development of the Billings Farm & Museum, still one of the finest Jersey farms in America.               National Park Service sites   Saint Gaudens National Historic Site - Cornish, NH (22 miles)  Appalachian National Scenic Trail           A typical Vermont scene Ed Sharron  Community Resources Woodstock, VT Chamber of Commerce  Hartford (VT) Area Chamber of Commerce  Vermont Attractions Association  Vermont Chamber of Commerce
